scripts.obfuscate:android:
javascript-obfuscator dist/index.android.bundle \
  --output dist/index.android.bundle \
  --compact true \
  --control-flow-flattening true \
  --dead-code-injection true \
  --string-array true \
  --string-array-threshold 0.75 \
  --identifier-names-generator mangled
scripts.obfuscate:ios:
javascript-obfuscator dist/index.ios.bundle    \
  --output dist/index.ios.bundle    \
  --compact true                    \
  --control-flow-flattening true    \
  --dead-code-injection true        \
  --string-array true               \
  --string-array-threshold 0.75     \
  --identifier-names-generator mangled
scripts.build:android: npm run bundle:android && npm run obfuscate:android
scripts.build:ios: npm run bundle:ios && npm run obfuscate:ios
